original_title: Story Store: Who's Minding the Store?
overview: Few events scare the Story Store's proprietor, George, more than knowing the Magic Inspector is on his way to check things out. Worse, George's worries may have brought on a 24-hour flu of sorts, and he must now rely on others to make sure the store's in great condition. But how will everything be done? A quick survey of the shelves reveals a Move-O Machine and Speed-o-Powder, which Pop and his pal seize upon. That's their first mistake. â€¦
title: Story Store: Who's Minding the Store?
